org.itemscript.core
Interface JsonUtil

public interface JsonUtil

An interface defining various utility methods that can't be static but aren't really part of the core JsonSystem interface.

Note: methods on this interface should be consider somewhat more subject to change than other parts of the API.

Author:
Jacob Davies
jacob@itemscript.org

Parameters:
url - The string to parse.
Returns:
A new Url object.
Throws:
ItemscriptError - If the string cannot be parsed as a Url.

generateB64id

java.lang.String generateB64id()
Generate a random base-64 unique-ID string. This is a 22-character representation of a 128-bit random unique-ID encoded as base64 without padding and containing only URL-safe characters.

Note: although this is a 128-bit random unique-ID, it is not technically a UUID because it may not have the flag bits set that say what type of ID it is.

Returns:
The new b64id.

generateUuid

java.lang.String generateUuid()
Generate a random UUID string.

Returns:
The new UUID.

int nextRandomInt()

Returns:
A new random int.
